item.title: Demo Setup
item.description: Explanation The nature of this plugin and HomeKit in general is very complex. In the past we have tried screenshots, videos, and other ways to show how things work. With this new demo setup, we are taking it to a new level. You can simply copy the code and paste it right into your Node-RED setup to begin playing with many (eventually all) available HomeKit accessories. Prerequisites You must have Node-RED and node-red-contrib-homekit-bridged (aka “our plugin”) installed on your system.
